pages.text: $(li)The Crimson Forest is red-like biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can find Crimson trees, Shroomlights, Crimson Roots and Crimson Fungus here.

$(li)Some creatures like Shroomloins, Hoglins, Crimson Mosquitos and Warped Toads can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Crimson Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
